document_data.caption: ''A pair of silent shoes.''
document_data.name: Silent shoes
document_data.mainbody: '''Silent shoes''' were special footwear used by some [[rogue]]s.
document_data.Uses: Creaking shoes were a thieve's nightmare. Silent shoes were soled with a rare flexible material found deep within the jungles of [[Chult]]. This substance eliminates any sound created by old leather from typical shoes or boots. These shoes were useful for minimizing noise when travelling within cities as well as natural habitats.
document_data.Prices: A pair of silent shoes cost 10 [[gold]].
